General.Name: The State Trading Corporation of India Limited
General.Description: The State Trading Corporation of India Limited engages in the trading business worldwide. The company exports and imports various products, including rice, wheat, sugar, pulses, edible oils, fertilizers, coals, bullion, etc. It also trades in bullion, hydrocarbon, metal, mineral, castor oil, ore, fertilizers, and petro-chemical products. The State Trading Corporation of India Limited was incorporated in 1956 and is based in New Delhi, India.
General.Address: Jawahar Vyapar Bhawan, New Delhi, India, 110001
